statements: SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT AVG(patient_age) AS average_age, MAX(patient_age) AS max_age, MIN(patient_age) AS min_age FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patient_records WHERE has_genetic_data = TRUE;
SELECT patient_name, gene_name FROM patient_records JOIN genetic_research_data ON patient_records.patient_id = genetic_research_data.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age >= 50 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_research_data WHERE mutation_type = 'Insertion' AND gene_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY data_id;
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(*) AS mutation_count FROM genetic_research_data GROUP BY gene_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY mutation_count DESC;

SELECT patient_name, age, gender, gene_name, mutation_type FROM patient_records JOIN genetic_research_data ON patient_records.patient_id = genetic_research_data.patient_id WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40;

SELECT patient_name, age, gender, gene_name, mutation_type FROM patient_records INNER JOIN genetic_research_data ON patient_records.patient_id = genetic_research_data.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Female' AND has_genetic_data = TRUE ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM PatientRecords ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE genetic_sequence LIKE '%ACGT%';
SELECT study_id, patient_id, genetic_id, study_description FROM PersonalizedMedicineStudies ORDER BY study_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM PatientRecords WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM GeneticData WHERE genetic_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM PatientRecords ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT study_description, study_results FROM PersonalizedMedicineStudies WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_records WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM research_studies WHERE study_id = 3;
SELECT result_id, result_data FROM study_results WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patient_records WHERE patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM genetic_data JOIN patient_records ON genetic_data.patient_id = patient_records.patient_id;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM research_studies WHERE study_description LIKE '%genetics%';
SELECT patient_name, result_data FROM patient_records JOIN study_results ON patient_records.patient_id = study_results.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, dob, gender FROM patient_records ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, genetic_sequence FROM patient_records JOIN genetic_data ON patient_records.patient_id = genetic_data.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, dob, diagnosis FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT genetic_sequence, mutation_type FROM genetic_data WHERE genetic_id > 100;
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_data FROM research_results WHERE study_id = 3 AND patient_id = 5;
